doc.field: Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings

Miscellaneous Stair and Rails, 1920 -1945 (2 folders); Municipal Building, East Orange, NJ, 1929, (Superb Bronze and Iron, Brooklyn, NY); Union Company of Detroit, 1927 (Superb Bronze and Iron); Hispanic Society, Broadway at 155th St., 1926; 164 East 72nd St., NYC, 1925; Mrs. E.F. Hutton Apartment, Fifth Ave., at 92nd St., 1925; Pennsylvania Railroad Station (Penn Station), 33rd St., NYC, 1926 (2 folders); 720 Park Ave., NYC, 1929; Peter Reilly Warehouse, Bergen St., Brooklyn, 1925; 71 Park Ave., NYC, 1923; Tyler, 17 John St., NYC, 1926; Penhellenic House, East 49th St., NYC, 1926; Central Hanover Bank and Trust, East 72nd St., NYC, 1931; Horatio Street Annex for the New York Edison Company, Philip Lenges Iron Works, Russel St., Brooklyn, NY, 1924; 133 East 64th St., NYC, 1927; Hotel Pierre, East 61 St., 1929 (3 folders)
